verses.verse: And Bezalel <S%H1212><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>: two cubits <S%H520><s%> and a half <S%H2677><s%> was the length <S%H753><s%> of it <S%H520><s%>, and a cubit and a half <S%H2677><s%> the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of it <S%H520><s%>, and a cubit and a half <S%H2677><s%> the height of it <S%H6967><s%>.

And he overlaid <S%H6823><s%> it with pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%> within <S%H1004><s%> and without <S%H2351><s%>, and made <S%H6213><s%> a crown <S%H2213><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> to it round about <S%H5439><s%>.

And he cast <S%H3332><s%> for it four <S%H702><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, in the four <S%H702><s%> feet <S%H6471><s%> thereof <S%H8147><s%>; even two rings <S%H2885><s%> on the one <S%H259><s%> side <S%H6763><s%> of it <S%H8147><s%>, and two rings <S%H2885><s%> on the other <S%H8145><s%> side of it <S%H6763><s%>.
And he made <S%H6213><s%> staves <S%H905><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>, and overlaid <S%H6823><s%> them with gold <S%H2091><s%>.
And he put <S%H935><s%> the staves <S%H905><s%> into the rings <S%H2885><s%> on the sides <S%H6763><s%> of the ark <S%H727><s%>, to bear <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%>.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> a mercy-seat <S%H3727><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>: two cubits <S%H520><s%> and a half <S%H2677><s%> was the length <S%H753><s%> thereof <S%H520><s%>, and a cubit and a half <S%H2677><s%> the breadth thereof <S%H7341><s%>.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> cherubim <S%H3742><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>; of beaten work <S%H4749><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> he them <S%H8147><s%>, at the two ends <S%H7098><s%> of the mercy-seat <S%H3727><s%>;

one <S%H259><s%> cherub <S%H3742><s%> at the one end <S%H7098><s%>, and one <S%H259><s%> cherub <S%H3742><s%> at the other end <S%H7098><s%>: of one piece with the mercy-seat <S%H3727><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> he the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> at the two <S%H8147><s%> ends thereof <S%H7098><s%>.

And the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> spread out <S%H6566><s%> their wings <S%H3671><s%> on high <S%H4605><s%>, covering <S%H5526><s%> the mercy-seat <S%H3727><s%> with their wings <S%H3671><s%>, with their faces <S%H6440><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to another <S%H251><s%>; toward the mercy-seat <S%H3727><s%> were the faces <S%H6440><s%> of the cherubim <S%H3742><s%>.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> the table <S%H7979><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>: two cubits <S%H520><s%> was the length <S%H753><s%> thereof <S%H520><s%>, and a cubit the breadth <S%H7341><s%> thereof <S%H520><s%>, and a cubit and a half <S%H2677><s%> the height thereof <S%H6967><s%>.
And he overlaid <S%H6823><s%> it with pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>, and made <S%H6213><s%> thereto a crown <S%H2213><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> unto it a border <S%H4526><s%> of a handbreadth <S%H2948><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, and made <S%H6213><s%> a golden <S%H2091><s%> crown <S%H2213><s%> to the border <S%H4526><s%> thereof round about <S%H5439><s%>.

And he cast <S%H3332><s%> for it four <S%H702><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> the rings <S%H2885><s%> in the four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H6285><s%> that were on the four <S%H702><s%> feet thereof <S%H7272><s%>.
Close by <S%H5980><s%> the border <S%H4526><s%> were the rings <S%H2885><s%>, the places <S%H1004><s%> for the staves <S%H905><s%> to bear <S%H5375><s%> the table <S%H7979><s%>.
And he made <S%H6213><s%> the staves <S%H905><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>, and overlaid <S%H6823><s%> them with gold <S%H2091><s%>, to bear <S%H5375><s%> the table <S%H7979><s%>.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> which were upon the table <S%H7979><s%>, the dishes <S%H7086><s%> thereof <S%H3709><s%>, and the spoons thereof <S%H4518><s%>, and the bowls thereof <S%H7184><s%>, and the flagons thereof <S%H2004><s%>, wherewith to pour <S%H5258><s%> out <S%H2889><s%>, of pure gold <S%H2091><s%>.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>: of beaten work <S%H4749><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> he the candlestick <S%H4501><s%>, even its base <S%H3409><s%>, and its shaft <S%H7070><s%>; its cups <S%H1375><s%>, it knops <S%H3730><s%>, and its flowers <S%H6525><s%>, were of one piece with it.

And there were six <S%H8337><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> going out <S%H3318><s%> of the sides <S%H6654><s%> thereof <S%H7969><s%>; three branches <S%H7070><s%> of the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> out of the one <S%H259><s%> side <S%H6654><s%> thereof <S%H7969><s%>, and three branches <S%H7070><s%> of the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> out of the other <S%H8145><s%> side thereof <S%H6654><s%>:

three <S%H7969><s%> cups <S%H1375><s%> made like almond-blossoms <S%H8246><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> branch <S%H7070><s%>, a knop <S%H3730><s%> and a flower <S%H6525><s%>, and three <S%H7969><s%> cups <S%H1375><s%> made like almond-blossoms <S%H8246><s%> in the other <S%H259><s%> branch <S%H7070><s%>, a knop <S%H3730><s%> and a flower <S%H6525><s%>: so for the six <S%H8337><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> going out <S%H3318><s%> of the candlestick <S%H4501><s%>.
And in the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> were four <S%H702><s%> cups <S%H1375><s%> made like almond-blossoms <S%H8246><s%>, the knops <S%H3730><s%> thereof <S%H6525><s%>, and the flowers thereof;

and a knop <S%H3730><s%> under two <S%H8147><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> of one piece with it <S%H3730><s%>, and a knop under two <S%H8147><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> of one piece with it <S%H3730><s%>, and a knop under two <S%H8147><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> of one piece with it <S%H8337><s%>, for the six branches <S%H7070><s%> going out of it <S%H3318><s%>.
Their knops <S%H3730><s%> and their branches <S%H7070><s%> were of one piece with it <S%H259><s%>: the whole of it was one beaten work <S%H4749><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> the lamps <S%H5216><s%> thereof <S%H7651><s%>, seven, and the snuffers <S%H4457><s%> thereof <S%H4289><s%>, and the snuffdishes thereof <S%H2889><s%>, of pure gold <S%H2091><s%>.
Of a talent <S%H3603><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> he it <S%H3627><s%>, and all the vessels thereof.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of incense <S%H7004><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>: a cubit <S%H520><s%> was the length <S%H753><s%> thereof <S%H520><s%>, and a cubit the breadth <S%H7341><s%> thereof <S%H7251><s%>, foursquare; and two cubits <S%H520><s%> was the height <S%H6967><s%> thereof <S%H7161><s%>; the horns thereof were of one piece with it.

And he overlaid <S%H6823><s%> it with pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>, the top <S%H1406><s%> thereof <S%H7023><s%>, and the sides thereof round about <S%H5439><s%>, and the horns <S%H7161><s%> of it <S%H6213><s%>: and he made unto it a crown <S%H2213><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> for it two <S%H8147><s%> golden <S%H2091><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> under the crown <S%H2213><s%> thereof <S%H8147><s%>, upon the two ribs <S%H6763><s%> thereof <S%H8147><s%>, upon the two sides <S%H6654><s%> of it <S%H1004><s%>, for places for staves <S%H905><s%> wherewith to bear it <S%H5375><s%>.
And he made <S%H6213><s%> the staves <S%H905><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>, and overlaid <S%H6823><s%> them with gold <S%H2091><s%>.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>, and the pure <S%H2889><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> of sweet spices <S%H5561><s%>, after the art <S%H4639><s%> of the perfumer <S%H7543><s%>.
